Reviews.Title: fine camera
Reviews.Author: TOMA
Reviews.Content: This is the best camera that I've ever had. Has helped me get a very high quality video as well as photo shoot., I think anyone who buys this camera will be satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Lea
Reviews.Content: This was a Christmas gift for my Daughter and Family who are temporarily living in Germany. They love, love, love the camera and are excited they can now document their stay with permenant visual memories. Because of their enjoyment and love of this camera, I'm considering getting one for myself.

ProductInfo.Name: Fujifilm FinePix S4200 24x Optical Zoom 14 MP 3 inch LCD Digital Camera 4 GB Bundle
